headers.title: Proxmox internal network VM not ping reply fail
headers.author: Seon Kim
headers.subject: Proxmox Errors

data.title: Issue
data.text: Internal network vmbr2 was unable to communicate with the outer network vmbr0. After using tcpdump -i eno1 host 192.168.1.100 this output shoewed up.

data.title: Solution
data.text: All i had to do was assign the IP to the network. I used the command: ip addr add 192.168.1.100/24 dev vmbr0
